title: OnePlus 7T review: best of the 7 Pro, for less
description: OnePlus announced the new OnePlus 7T, a follow-up to the OnePlus 7, which was released in global markets earlier this year, and last years OnePlus 6T. The 7T has a lot of the same features as its sibling, the OnePlus 7 Pro, but its a little smaller and costs less. Youll be able to buy the 7T starting on October 18th for $599.
